'''Fontemer Seagrass''' are an underwater exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]].

Fontemer Seagrass is a type of Fontemer Aberrant that takes the form of kelp/seaweed. It forms a spherical barrier around an object such as a chest, small creature, Mora Chest, or occasionally quest/puzzle related items. This sphere is connected to the surrounding surface by one or more 'legs' of seagrass. 

Use the [[Fontemer Water Blade]] ability to destroy the weak points on each leg. Some Fontemer Seagrass require destroying multiple weak points at the same time.
